subject: Launchy Regulatory Roundup #47 - White House Crypto Report Proposes Stockpile, Regulation Clarity
body: View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/6fbc9ab2-2303-421f-9926-836633e78072/image.png?t=1740314845) Caption: 📢** ****[Sponsor](https://forms.gle/HcAfDZZeqF7U15Eo6)**** | **💡** ****[Telegram](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)**** | **📰** ****[Past Editions](https://launchy.beehiiv.com/)** **Good Morning. ** Welcome to our 47th edition of the regulatory roundup. If you know anybody who would benefit from this content, please help us spread the word! Share the newsletter (https://launchy.beehiiv.com/subscribe/49f19459-cfc1-47b4-a90b-77e7ee215729/referrals?_bhlid=1a0c30b1d1c828aa8b4c44d5069ae964f39996f9&jwt_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWJzY3JpYmVyX2lkIjoiNDlmMTk0NTktY2ZjMS00N2I0LWE5MGItNzdlN2VlMjE1NzI5IiwicHVibGljYXRpb25faWQiOiI5Y2Q3YjM5Mi1hZGJiLTRjYzEtYmYxOC05OTM1NmNmYzI2ODUiLCJleHAiOjE3NTQ0MDI1NzUsImlzcyI6Imh0dHBzOi8vYXBwLmJlZWhpaXYuY29tIiwiaWF0IjoxNzU0MjI5Nzc1fQ.APAIS92FQ2jpaIA3Fal8BO4tInulM_QJedl6xC3qrQ8) ——————————————————————————— **In Today's Edition:** * **Headline: **White House Crypto Report Proposes Stockpile, Regulation Clarity 👀 * **Global Legal Roundup** * **Case Study:** How the GENIUS Act Reshapes Stablecoin Landscape 🔎 You read and share. _We listen and improve_. Send us feedback at [marco@launchy.app](http://marco@launchy.app). “_For daily market updates and airdrop alphas, check out our __[telegram!](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)_“ — View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **HEADLINE** ## **White House Crypto Report Proposes Stockpile, Regulation Clarity** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/e5a37534-6d11-4dca-9872-c8baebf4e9ee/Screen_Shot_2025-08-03_at_19.50.28.png?t=1754225438) Caption: **State of play:** The White House has [released](https://www.theblock.co/post/363994/white-houses-working-group-releases-lengthy-crypto-report-including-legislative-proposals-crypto-stockpile-details) a crypto report, calling it the most comprehensive digital asset policy document to date. It stems from a January executive order by President Trump that formed the Working Group on Digital Asset Markets. * Key figures involved include Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, and SEC Chair Paul Atkins. * The report supports crypto innovation and recommends a clear regulatory framework, including a right for individuals to self-custody assets and expanded oversight powers for the CFTC over non-security spot markets. * It also pushes for guidance on crypto taxation, particularly concerning unrealized gains, wrapping transactions, and de minimis use. A major highlight is the plan to form a strategic US crypto reserve, including assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, and Cardano. This reserve will be funded through forfeiture proceedings and administered by the Treasury. * The Bitcoin portion is not intended to be sold but kept for strategic objectives. **What’s Next: **The report complements recent legislative progress, including the GENIUS Act for stablecoins and the Clarity framework for broader market regulation, signaling the US is moving toward a more structured crypto policy era. **Why it Matters:** This marks the strongest policy endorsement of crypto from the US government, laying the groundwork for self-custody rights, market clarity, and a national crypto reserve. **Our Take:** The report signals that the US is finally treating crypto as strategic infrastructure, not just speculative tech. Expect real regulatory movement ahead. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **GLOBAL LEGAL ROUNDUP** ### **America:** * 🇺🇲 **DOJ** [backtracks](https://www.theblock.co/post/364788/doj-wont-pursue-charges-against-dragonfly-exec-says) on pursuing charges against Dragonfly. * 🇺🇲** Democrats** [press](https://cointelegraph.com/news/warren-democrats-press-occ-how-deal-with-trump-crypto-ties) bank regulator on Trump stablecoin conflicts. * 🇺🇲 **Uniswap, a16z, and allies** [urge](https://www.theblock.co/post/365317/uniswap-a16z-and-allies-urge-senate-to-carve-out-defi-in-market-structure-bill) Senate to protect DeFi developers. * 🇺🇲 **Firms** [amend](https://www.theblock.co/post/365168/firms-amend-sol-fund-filings-as-they-look-to-get-the-secs-approval) SOL ETF filings as they look to get the SEC's approval. * 🇺🇲** US appeals court** [overturns](https://www.theblock.co/post/365052/us-appeals-court-overturns-opensea-product-manager-nathanial-chastains-wire-fraud-and-money-laundering-conviction) OpenSea product manager’s conviction. * 🇺🇲** SEC Chair** [calls](https://cointelegraph.com/news/sec-chairman-atkins-reshore-crypto-companies-back-to-the-us) to ‘reshore crypto’ as companies move back to the US. * 🇺🇲** SEC** [approves](https://www.theblock.co/post/364703/sec-approves-in-kind-redemptions-for-spot-bitcoin-and-ethereum-etfs-increases-options-limits) in-kind redemptions for spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. * 🇺🇲 **SEC Chair Atkins** [debuts](https://www.theblock.co/post/365096/sec-chair-atkins-debuts-project-crypto-to-update-rules-and-regulations-with-a-focus-on-onchain) 'Project Crypto' to update rules and regulations. * 🇺🇲 **Sen. Lummis** [introduces](https://www.theblock.co/post/364654/lummis-bill-fannie-mae-freddie-mac-consider-crypto-mortgages) bill to consider crypto as an asset for mortgages. ### **Europe:** * 🇬🇧 **UK financial regulator **[to open](https://www.theblock.co/post/365245/uk-crypto-etns-retail) retail access to crypto ETNs. ### **APAC:** * 🇮🇩** Indonesia **[to hike](https://www.theblock.co/post/364784/indonesia-hikes-crypto-transaction-taxes) crypto transaction taxes starting August. * 🇰🇷** Bank of Korea** [to launch](https://cointelegraph.com/news/south-korean-central-bank-creates-virtual-asset-division) virtual asset committee to monitor crypto. * 🇭🇰** Hong Kong** [to begin](https://cointelegraph.com/news/hong-kong-announces-6-month-stablecoin-regulatory-transition-plan) 6-month transition period for new stablecoin rules. * 🇰🇷** South Korea **[to target](https://cointelegraph.com/news/south-korea-crypto-lending-guidelines-august) leveraged crypto lending services with new rules. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **CASE STUDY** ## **How the GENIUS Act Reshapes Stablecoin Landscape** _Credits to Cointelegraph & Fabian Dori for the _[_original podcast_](https://cointelegraph.com/news/the-state-of-stablecoins-after-genius-act-expert-weighs-in) **State of play:** The GENIUS Act, now US law, establishes a strict federal framework for fiat-backed stablecoins, requiring full asset backing, federal licensing, and independent reserve audits. Fabian Dori, CIO at Sygnum Bank, said on Cointelegraph’s Byte-Sized Insight podcast that these measures will give institutional investors the legal clarity they need to adopt regulated stablecoins at scale. * However, the act bans yield-bearing stablecoins, drawing a clear line between non-yielding payment tokens and tokenized money market funds. * This could significantly alter DeFi dynamics by limiting passive income options directly from fiat-backed stablecoins. * Dori also noted that while the EU has been slower and more risk-averse with its digital finance approach, the US is now positioning itself as the more innovation-friendly environment. **Our Take:** The GENIUS Act could prompt Europe to accelerate its own regulatory efforts to stay competitive. ——————————————————————————— _Take a peek at our referral reward at the bottom of this issue. Share this newsletter and receive our comprehensive database of crypto regulations around the world👇_ View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ccbcdb05-f111-44c8-b65c-2e30d84cec0f/image.png) Caption: **NOTEWORTHY READS & MEME** * **Jake Chervinsky’s** [thread](https://x.com/jchervinsky/status/1951276955401142667) on “Project Crypto.” * **Rebecca Rettig’s **[thread](https://x.com/RebeccaRettig1/status/1950631954774450612) on the President's WG Report. * **Miles Jennings’s** [thread](https://x.com/milesjennings/status/1951006516171120663) on the Senate’s market structure legislation.
